entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GC commits twice the limit when using large pages #103203
  • AllocationTick event is missing on NativeAOT #103198
  • InvalidProgramException with System.Linq.Expressions and user-defined conditional operators #103197
  • Incorrect local time zone reported on macOS #103196
  • `-p:BaseOutputPath=` doesn't override property on linux #103194
  • Ensure that Microsoft.Extensions.Http.DefaultHttpClientFactory is supporting distributed tracing #103192
  • Code coverage fails on some assemblies #103190

Closed

  • Cancellation on NetworkStream.ReadAsync closes local connection but remote server end-point still seems to be connected #69397
  • [API Proposal]: bool System.Reflection.MetadataReader.TryGetString(StringHandle handle, Span<char> span, out int length); #103169
  • ReadOnlySequence<byte> CopyTo byte array Error #103201
  • NET8.0，Socket，Why can I send so much data continuously #103107
  • SslStream not working with ephemeral keys #103101

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize relocation counting in DehydratedDataNode.GetData #103202
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some FEATURE_... ifdefs in the GC #103200
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Micro-optimize type check in GVMDependenciesNode.SearchDynamicDependencies #103199
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete dead code in winwrap.h #103193
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Support IAlternateEqualityComparer with FrozenDictionary/Set #103191
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a few small leaks by properly freeing the result of g_strsplit #103189
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 5 #103188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing includes for FreeBSD 14 in pal_networkstatistics.c #103187
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • field sequences for boxes #103185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix CET - remove writing to shadow stack #103171
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Migrate more ghashtables to simdhash #102476
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add MIT license header to DotnetProxyTrustManager.java #103165
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse and box+isinst+unbox.any patterns up front #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `-dead_strip` linker optimization by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove cached cgroup values (#102971) #103166
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2469221 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable escape analysis and use in vn #103148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add more ZipArchive tests to confirm the Zip64 fix does not affect reading zip files generatd with the old bug #103152
    area-System.IO.Compression

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Net #41491

Updated

  • VMR CI build failures during restore: The "RestoreTask" task returned false but did not log an error #41477
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Question about msbuild dependencies #2310
    Discussion
  • dotnet watch fails when directory has multiple csproj files #33674
  • Info produced by `dotnet -?` about `dotnet help` is inaccurate. It says the command "Show command line help" rather than show online documentation in browser #41173
  • Implicit framework reference not include System.Windows.Forms for net20 #34852

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Ensure development manifest resolves tokens #41498
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Disable CET compatibility setting on apphost when `CetCompat` property is set to `false` #41483
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add extension WG meeting notes on type erasure codegen #8194

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert failure in `BindMethodBody.assertBindIdentifierTargets()` with `[param:]` attribute on local function #73905

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35007.86 #73903
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35007.84 #73904

PullRequests

Created

  • Show semantic snippets test flaw #73908
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Editorconfig options enumerator refactoring #73907
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Throw when there is a syntax version mismatch in codelens #73902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Apply editorconfig settings to moved ExternalAccess #73896
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [cherry-pick] Use separate async tracker for SG work instad of reusing workspace async tracker #73895
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Follow up on added ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable saving source texts to memory mapped files on non-Windows platforms #73628
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid running generators when nothing has changed in a compilation tracker. #73897
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56140
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56139
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, plaintext, single_query #56138
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #56137
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #56136
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #56135
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, single_query #56134
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #56130
  • Perf improvement: json, json #56129

Closed

  • Change in behavior for controller parameters or httpClient.PutAsJsonAsync after .NET6 (.NET 7 and .NET 8) #56141
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes, plainTextEmptyFilter #56113
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, updates #56090

PullRequests

Created

  • text fix: 'There' -> 'their' plus minor tweaks #56132
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Improve E2E tests performance #56127
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Add support for OpenAPI schema transformers #56093
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Update Components build and E2E testing instructions #56106
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Allowing for the content type/encoding to be specified for the main Result types #55888
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56123
    area-infrastructure
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Add hidden input for easier binding in static edit forms #55989
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Application.Current?.Quit() cannot close all windows in Win Platform #22933
  • Accounts count sets to 0 in MSAL, after the application auto update. (Windows) #22928

Closed

  • Invalid Xaml "sys:DateTime". #22932
  • Button Render full screen when using Gradient as Background #22931
  • Wrong content type when choosing photo #22930
  • Datepicker date format display incorrect in windows but ok on android #19967
    Backlog
  • @PureWeen if this PR fixes bug 14916, how about adding PR14917's UI test here? #22929
  • [Enhancement] Improve the rasterization scale / content scale factor #887
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Profile iOS and Android memory leaks #1389
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Rework the WinUI control to NOT use custom control templates #1738
    Backlog
  • Pen Input Support on Views #1849
    Backlog
  • [Spec] Introduce Actions and remove Events and Commands properties from controls #2733
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Merge `release/8.0.1xx-sr6` to `main` #22935
  • Ignore orientation CarV test for Mac #22934
  • [WinUI] Fix DateTimeFormatter for "ddd" #20045
    area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Bump to 8.0.70 Versioning #22921
  • 8.0.60 Release Versioning #22920

Updated

  • Fix animated gifs in Release builds #22874
    area-image
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Attempt to fix crash in MauiApplication.OnCreate() #22911
    area-core-lifecycle, community ✨
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
    area-core-platform
  • Fixed all remaining CA1416 errors #22868
    area-core-platform
  • `Size` and `SizeF` should not throw on `NaN` #22890
    area-core-platform

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing checks for predicate when simplifying JSON primitive collections #33932
  • Cosmos: query fragments get evaluated (synchronously) in the shaper, causing sync I/O errors #33931
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Cosmos: work on Skip/Take, undefined #33935
  • Simplify NOT (CASE ... THEN const) by pushing NOT into the THEN/ELSE #33934
  • Add missing check for predicate in primitive collection simplifications #33933

Updated

  • Fix for #33702 Translation for the SQL Server PATINDEX function #33868
